name: Yoshino Fujieda
effect: [On Play] Return 1 Digi-Egg card from your trash to the bottom of your Digi-Egg deck.[Your Turn] When digivolving one of your Digimon into a Digimon card in your hand with ＜Digi-Burst＞, you may suspend this Tamer to reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
